mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOUGHT (UBNO, BDATE, COIN, BUYCNT, BUYPRICE, ACNTNO) SELECT UBNO, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), COIN, BUYCNT, BUYPRICE, ACNTNO FROM WAITBOUGHT WHERE COIN = #{coin} AND BUYPRICE = #{buyprice}
INSERT INTO BOUGHT VALUES( SEQ_BOUGHT.NEXTVAL, #{coin}, #{buycnt}, #{buyprice}, default, #{acntno})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOUGHT WHERE ACNTNO = #{acntno} ORDER BY BDATE DESC
